sections.text: 01|License of ferries.Effective:January 1, 2004Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 123 - 124th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) No person shall keep a ferry across a stream running through or bounding on a county in this state, without having obtained a license therefor from the court of common pleas of such county.(B) Whoever violates this section shall be fined not more than thirty dollars.
